BroadcastTopicGroup.name: BroadcastTopicGroup
BroadcastTopicGroup.description: Represents a junction object that relates a group to an alert type broadcast topic. The broadcast sends the alert to this group.

GroupId.description: ID of the group where the alert of the associated BroadcastTopic record with an Alert BroadcastType is sent to.

Name.description: Name of the broadcast topic group.
